The Haxe Ludum Dare 35 Roundup

by Skial Bainn published on Saturday 23rd April 2016

Table of Contents

  • Heaps
  • Luxe Engine
  • OpenFL
  • HaxeFlixel
Add your game Correct this issue

This is the seventh dedicated Ludum Dare roundup for Haxe. Ludum Dare 35 took place between April 15th and 18th with the chosen theme being Shapeshift.

Heap

  • Sub Dragon by Sébastien Bénard - “deepnight”.

  • Shapewings by eolhing.

Luxe Engine

  • The Tale of Lapkovius by Ziege.

  • Geometry Ninja by Anders Nissen.
  • vertex. by Jakob Kuen.
  • Strata: The Shapeshifting Microworld by Adam Parrott.
  • OUROBOROS by undefinist.
  • Space Shift by Digital Apathy.
  • Shift Snap by Daniel.
  • Slime Tech by Momin Khan.
  • Pink by Eduardo Lopes.

OpenFL

  • Soko Match by Francois van Kiekerk.

  • Swarm Blast by 01101101.

HaxeFlixel

  • Shifty’s Shape Escape by Kevin Purcell.
  • Runaway Clothes by Igor S. and pals.

  • SpinStar by Gamepopper.
  • News Anchor Simulator by Ali hassan.
  • Potion Laboratory Expert by SebBernery.
  • SHIFTROMINO by Bob.
  • OFFLOAD by Anupam.
  • Reconfigure by Peter Hancock.
  • 2ShiftDrift by 01010111.
